h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Ending (True Ending)
h2_title: Unlock and Complete Secret: Ancient Guanyin Temple (Chapter 1)
content: To unlock the secret area in Chapter 1, you'll need to ring 3 bells. Doing this will automatically transport you to the hidden area, where you can beat the Chapter's secret boss.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Ending_(True_Ending).md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Secret Ending (True Ending)', specifically from the subsection 'Unlock and Complete Secret: Ancient Guanyin Temple (Chapter 1)'.
The content is as follows:
To unlock the secret area in Chapter 1, you'll need to ring 3 bells. Doing this will automatically transport you to the hidden area, where you can beat the Chapter's secret boss.
